labor_certification_applications|employe: TEXT. Unique identifier for the employer. PK.
TEXT. Employer point of contact email address. PK. Example: skaul@avanthealthcare.com.
TEXT. Reference to the employer’s firm. FK to employer.corpHandle.
TEXT. Reference to the employer’s postal code. FK to employer.ZipRef.
labor_certification_applications|prepare: TEXT. Last name of the preparer. Example: Peace.
TEXT. First name of the preparer. Example: Tyler.
TEXT. Middle initial of the preparer. Example: J.
TEXT. Business name of the preparer. **NULL means no business name provided.**. Example: Musillo Unkenholt, LLC..
labor_certification_applications|worksit: TEXT. Primary address line of the worksite. PK.
TEXT. City of the worksite. PK.
TEXT. State of the worksite. PK.
TEXT. Postal code of the worksite. PK.
TEXT. Secondary entity associated with the worksite. **NULL means no secondary entity specified.**. Possible values: No, Yes.
TEXT. Name of the secondary entity. **NULL means no secondary entity name provided.**. Example: Billings Clinic Health System.
TEXT. Secondary address line of the worksite. **NULL means no secondary address provided.**. Example: 800.
TEXT. County of the worksite. **NULL means no county specified.**. Example: YELLOWSTONE.
labor_certification_applications|prevail: TEXT. Unique tracking number for the prevailing wage record. PK.
labor_certification_applications|cases|f: TEXT. Unique case number identifier. PK.
labor_certification_applications|cases|s: TEXT. Current status of the case. Possible values: CERTIFIED, Certified, certified.
labor_certification_applications|cases|r: TEXT. Date the case was received. Possible values: 2023/12/21.
labor_certification_applications|cases|d: TEXT. Date the case decision was made. **NULL means decision date not provided.**. Possible values: 2023-12-29.
labor_certification_applications|cases|O: DATE. Original certification date. **NULL means certification date not provided.**. Possible values: .
labor_certification_applications|cases|v: enum_visa_class. Visa class for the case. Possible values: E-3 Australian, H-1B, H-1B1 Chile, H-1B1 Singapore.
labor_certification_applications|cases|j: TEXT. Job title associated with the case. Example: Registered Nurse.
labor_certification_applications|cases|S: TEXT. Standard Occupational Classification (SOC) code. Example: 29-1141.00.
labor_certification_applications|cases|s: TEXT. SOC title for the job role. Example: Registered Nurses.
labor_certification_applications|cases|F: TEXT. Full-time employment indicator (Y/N). Possible values: 0, 1, N, Y.
labor_certification_applications|cases|b: TEXT. Start date of employment. Example: 21/12/2023.
labor_certification_applications|cases|e: TEXT. End date of employment. **NULL means no end date provided.**. Example: 2026 20th Dec..
labor_certification_applications|cases|h: BIGINT. Total number of worker positions in the case. Possible values: 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, 25, 50.
labor_certification_applications|cases|n: BIGINT. Number of new employment positions. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 5, 10, 20.
labor_certification_applications|cases|c: BIGINT. Number of continued employment positions. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 5, 10.
BIGINT. Number of changes from previous employment. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 5.
BIGINT. Number of concurrent new employment positions. Possible values: 0, 1.
BIGINT. Number of employer changes. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 5, 10.
labor_certification_applications|cases|a: BIGINT. Flag indicating if the petition is amended. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 5.
labor_certification_applications|cases|s: BIGINT. Total number of worksite locations. Possible values: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10.
labor_certification_applications|cases|A: TEXT. Agreement to the labor condition statement. Possible values: Yes.
labor_certification_applications|cases|h: enum_h1b_dependent. Indicates if the applicant is a dependent under H-1B. Possible values: No, Yes.
labor_certification_applications|cases|w: enum_willful_violator. Indicates if the employer is a willful violator. Possible values: No.
labor_certification_applications|cases|S: enum_support_h1b. Indicates if the employer supports H-1B. Possible values: Yes.
labor_certification_applications|cases|s: TEXT. Statutory basis for the case. Possible values: $60,000 or higher annual wage, Both $60,000 or higher in annual wage and Masters Degree or higher in related specialty.
labor_certification_applications|cases|a: TEXT. Indicates if Appendix A is attached. Possible values: .
labor_certification_applications|cases|p: TEXT. Public disclosure status. Possible values: Disclose Business, Disclose Business and Employment, Disclose Employment.
labor_certification_applications|cases|h: TEXT. Employer reference. FK to employer.corpHandle. Example: Avant Healthcare Professionals, LLC..
TEXT. Employer postal code reference. FK to employer.ZipRef. Example: 32751.
labor_certification_applications|cases|p: TEXT. Preparer’s email address. FK to preparer.prepMail. Example: tyler.peace@muimmigration.com.
labor_certification_applications|case_at: TEXT. Case number reference. FK to cases.fileKey.
TEXT. Attorney's email address. FK to attorney.lawMail. Example: tyler.peace@muimmigration.com.
enum_agent_representing_employer. Indicates if the attorney is representing the employer. Possible values: No, Yes.
labor_certification_applications|case_wo: TEXT. Case number reference. FK to cases.fileKey. PK. Example: I-200-23355-584296.
TEXT. Primary worksite address line. PK. Example: 2800 10th Avenue North.
TEXT. Worksite city. PK. Example: Billings.
TEXT. Worksite state. PK. Example: MT.
TEXT. Worksite postal code. PK. Example: 59101.
BIGINT. Number of workers at the worksite. Possible values: 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, 25, 50.
TEXT. Wage tracking number reference. FK to prevailing_wage.trackNo. Example: 1.

labor_certification_applications|employe.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups the employer's full address, contact details, and classification data into a structured JSONB format.

address.line1: TEXT. Employer’s primary address line. Example: 2301 Lucien Way.
address.line2: TEXT. Employer’s secondary address line. **NULL means no secondary address provided.**. Example: Suite 360.
address.city: TEXT. City of the employer’s location. Example: Maitland.
address.state: TEXT. State of the employer’s location. Example: FL.
address.zip: TEXT. Postal code for the employer’s address. PK.
address.country: TEXT. Country of the employer. **NULL means no country specified.**. Possible values: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
address.province: TEXT. Province or region of the employer. **NULL means no province specified.**. Example: TX.

phone.number: BIGINT. Employer’s main phone number. Example: (140) 768 12999.
phone.extension: BIGINT. Extension number for the employer's phone. **NULL means no extension provided.**. Example: 0.0.

fields_meaning.naics_code: BIGINT. North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for the employer. Example: 561320.
fields_meaning.alternate_name: TEXT. Alternate name or trade name of the employer. **NULL means no alternate name provided.**. Example: Lattice.

labor_certification_applications|attorne.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures identifying details of the attorney, including name, address, firm, and court affiliation.

name.first: TEXT. First name of the attorney. Example: Maria.
name.middle: TEXT. Middle initial of the attorney. **NULL means no middle initial provided.**. Example: T..
name.last: TEXT. Last name of the attorney. Example: Schneider.

address.line1: TEXT. Primary address line for the attorney. Example: 302 West Third Street.
address.line2: TEXT. Secondary address line for the attorney. **NULL means no secondary address provided.**. Example: Suite 710.
address.city: TEXT. City of the attorney. Example: Cincinnati.
address.state: TEXT. State of the attorney. Example: OH.
address.zip: TEXT. Postal code for the attorney. Example: 45202.
address.country: TEXT. Country of the attorney. Possible values: CANADA, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
address.province: TEXT. Province or region of the attorney. **NULL means no province specified.**. Example: Ontario.

contact.phone: BIGINT. Phone number for the attorney. Example: 15133818472.0.
contact.extension: BIGINT. Extension number for the attorney’s phone. **NULL means no extension provided.**. Example: 7375.0.

fields_meaning.firm: TEXT. Law firm name or business name. Example: Musillo Unkenholt, LLC..

highest_court.state: TEXT. State of the highest court the attorney is registered with. **NULL means no state provided.**. Example: OH.
highest_court.name: TEXT. Name of the highest court the attorney is registered with. **NULL means no court name provided.**. Example: Supreme Court of Ohio.

labor_certification_applications|prevail.column_meaning: JSONB column. Summarizes offered and prevailing wage details including ranges, units, and source information.

offered_wage.from: TEXT. Minimum wage rate of pay from. Example: $35.42.
offered_wage.to: REAL. Maximum wage rate of pay to. **NULL means maximum wage not provided.**. Example: 150000.0.
offered_wage.unit: enum_wage_unit_of_pay. Unit of pay for the wage rate (e.g., Hour, Week, Year). Possible values: Hour, Week, Year.

prevailing_wage.value: TEXT. Prevailing wage value. Example: USD 35.42.
prevailing_wage.unit: enum_pw_unit_of_pay. Unit of pay for the prevailing wage. Possible values: Hour, Month, Week, Year.
prevailing_wage.level: enum_pw_wage_level. Wage level classification for the position. Possible values: I, II, III, IV.
prevailing_wage.oes_year: TEXT. OES year for the prevailing wage survey. **NULL means no OES span provided.**. Possible values: 7/1/2023 - 6/30/2024.

alternate_source.source_type: enum_pw_other_source. Source of the prevailing wage information. Possible values: CBA, Survey.
alternate_source.source_year: BIGINT. Year of the alternative wage source. **NULL means no year specified.**. Possible values: 2016.0, 2017.0, 2022.0, 2023.0.
alternate_source.publisher: TEXT. Name of the prevailing wage survey publisher. Example: Willis Towers Watson.
alternate_source.survey_title: TEXT. Title of the prevailing wage survey. Example: Gen. Industry Professional (Technical and Operations) Report.

labor_certification_applications|employe.column_meaning: JSONB column. Encapsulates personal and location-based contact details for the employer’s point of contact.

name.first: TEXT. First name of the employer’s point of contact. Example: Saloni.
name.middle: TEXT. Middle name of the employer’s point of contact. **NULL means no middle name provided.**. Example: R..
name.last: TEXT. Last name of the employer’s point of contact. Example: Kaul.

fields_meaning.title: TEXT. Job title of the employer’s point of contact. Example: Director of Immigration.

address.line1: TEXT. Primary address line for the employer’s point of contact. Example: 2301 Lucien Way.
address.line2: TEXT. Secondary address line for the employer’s point of contact. **NULL means no secondary address provided.**. Example: Suite 360.
address.city: TEXT. City of the employer’s point of contact. Example: Maitland.
address.state: TEXT. State of the employer’s point of contact. Example: FL.
address.zip: TEXT. Postal code of the employer’s point of contact. Example: 32751.
address.country: TEXT. Country of the employer’s point of contact. Possible values: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
address.province: TEXT. Province or region of the employer’s point of contact. **NULL means no province specified.**. Possible values: CALIFORNIA, California, GEORGIA, New York, TEXAS, TX.

phone.number: TEXT. Phone number for the employer’s point of contact. Example: 14076812999.
phone.extension: BIGINT. Extension number for the employer’s point of contact’s phone. **NULL means no extension provided.**. Example: 0.0.
